Description: Glazed composition (faience) amulet in the form of the White Crown of Upper Egypt; mound-made and covered with a blue-green glaze; perforated for suspension; glaze worn in places.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.124, Tomb 229)
